channel.title: THE OLD SCHOOL RADIO HOUR
channel.description:
The Old School Radio Hour(OSRH) is a weekly radio program that showcases hip hop’s early era from the 1970s to the late 1980s through the use of classic hip hop singles, break beats that helped build the culture in its infancy, rare recordings of live jams, reviews of albums, videos, and books, and interviews with legends, pioneers, and innovators who helped create a culture and special guest Djs. The show is hosted by TG-The Analog Master of Disaster.
New and classic shows are presented each week.
Please support us and donate to help keep The Old School Radio Hour on the air. Help us keep hip hop history alive.
Questions,comments or concerns,email list: oldschoolradiohour@gmail.com
Facebook: www.facebook.com/theoldschoolradiohour
Myspace: www.myspace.com/oldschoolradiohour
Twitter: www.twitter.com/oldschoolradio
channel.itunes:subtitle: Catch the spirit of the old school!
channel.itunes:author: THE OLD SCHOOL RADIO HOUR

item.title: SURESHOT ANALOG TELEVISION-EPISODE 5
item.description: Here is our brand new episode of SATV,one of the hottest and freshest video shows on the net giving you nothing but the best in classic hip hop. On this one,we are giving it to you from Raw South Street,a hip hop apparel store in Philly. TG hosts this funky hour with more of some of your favorite oldies and featuring guest correspondent and hip hop historian,Troy L. Smith interviewing the pioneering T-Ski Valley about Valley Park in the Bronx plus a performance by the Catch The Beat man!
item.dc:creator: THE OLD SCHOOL RADIO HOUR
item.itunes:summary: Here is our brand new episode of SATV,one of the hottest and freshest video shows on the net giving you nothing but the best in classic hip hop. item.title: SURESHOT ANALOG TELEVISION-EPISODE 4
item.description: Episode 4 of our new program features more of your favorite classic hip hop music videos plus our first artist spotlight with West Coast's electro hip hop pioneer,The Egyptian Lover. This was originally broadcast on USTREAM on July 7, 2011.
item.dc:creator: THE OLD SCHOOL RADIO HOUR
item.itunes:summary: Episode 4 of our new program features more of your favorite classic hip hop music videos plus our first artist spotlight with West Coast's electro hip hop pioneer,The Egyptian Lover. This was originally broadcast on USTREAM on July 7, 2011.

item.title: SURESHOT ANALOG TELEVISION-EPISODE 3
item.description: Here is the 3rd episode and this is all about some of the freshest cats that hit the ones and twos on The Old School Radio Hour's monthly series,Masters of The Scratch and it's all VIDEO!!! Among the masters you'll see are Johnny Juice Rosado of Public Enemy,Danny Dan-The Beatman,Grandmaster Supreme,Philly's own cutmasters DJ Doodles and Grandwizard Rasheen. Plus more of some of the coolest classic hip hop music videos.
item.dc:creator: THE OLD SCHOOL RADIO HOUR
item.itunes:summary: Here is the 3rd episode and this is all about some of the freshest cats that hit the ones and twos on The Old School Radio Hour's monthly series,Masters of The Scratch and it's all VIDEO!!! Among the masters you'll see are Johnny Juice Rosado of Public Enemy,Danny Dan-The Beatman,Grandmaster Supreme,Philly's own cutmasters DJ Doodles and Grandwizard Rasheen. Plus more of some of the coolest classic hip hop music videos.

item.title: SURESHOT ANALOG TELEVISION-EPISODE 2
item.description: This is the second episode of the new show,SATV. On this one,we are representing from the 10th Annual B-Boy BBQ from West Philly. Featuring performances by Schoolly-D and The Tuff Crew plus more classic hip hop music videos and more highlights from this awesome jam.
item.dc:creator: THE OLD SCHOOL RADIO HOUR
item.itunes:summary: This is the second episode of the new show,SATV. On this one,we are representing from the 10th Annual B-Boy BBQ from West Philly. Featuring performances by Schoolly-D and The Tuff Crew plus more classic hip hop music videos and more highlights from this awesome jam.

item.title: THE OLD SCHOOL RADIO HOUR:THE KOOL KYLE STORY
item.description: Here's a gem from '09. Kool Kyle-The Original Starchild sits down with TG and tells his side of the story. On this episode,you will hear some live material from Kyle's days as a party rocker at Grandmaster Flash's parties during the late 70s and his classic songs like "Do Ya Like That Funky Beat","It's Rockin Time" and more.
item.dc:creator: THE OLD SCHOOL RADIO HOUR
item.itunes:summary: Here's a gem from '09. Kool Kyle-The Original Starchild sits down with TG and tells his side of the story. On this episode,you will hear some live material from Kyle's days as a party rocker at Grandmaster Flash's parties during the late 70s and his classic songs like "Do Ya Like That Funky Beat","It's Rockin Time" and more.

item.title: SURESHOT ANALOG TELEVISION-EPISODE 1-PART 2
item.description: This is the 2nd part of our first episode and it features some brief highlights of the Footwork b-boy battle and more music videos and other cool pieces plus a tribute to the late Gil Scott-Heron.
item.dc:creator: THE OLD SCHOOL RADIO HOUR
item.itunes:summary: This is the 2nd part of our first episode and it features some brief highlights of the Footwork b-boy battle and more music videos and other cool pieces plus a tribute to the late Gil Scott-Heron.

item.title: SURESHOT ANALOG TELEVISION-EPISODE 1-PART 1
item.description: The Old School Radio Hour practically comes to television and this is what becomes of it. Sureshot Analog Television,a brand new show showcasing classic hip hop visuals with music videos,interviews and event coverage and many more. TG hosts the first part of this new show and it features some music videos by some of your favorite hip hop legends and highlights of the Footwork Battle hosted by Repstyles own,Steve Believe.
item.dc:creator: THE OLD SCHOOL RADIO HOUR
item.itunes:summary: The Old School Radio Hour practically comes to television and this is what becomes of it. Sureshot Analog Television,a brand new show showcasing classic hip hop visuals with music videos,interviews and event coverage and many more. TG hosts the first part of this new show and it features some music videos by some of your favorite hip hop legends and highlights of the Footwork Battle hosted by Repstyles own,Steve Believe.

item.title: THE OLD SCHOOL RADIO HOUR:THE CHARLIE PRINCE STORY
item.description: Charlie Prince,MC and DJ and member of The Dynamic Three with DJ Rockmaster Scott makes his appearance and talks about his time in the hip hop culture. Classics such as "The Roof Is On Fire" among others plus some newer material are heard in this episode.
item.dc:creator: THE OLD SCHOOL RADIO HOUR
item.itunes:summary: Charlie Prince,MC and DJ and member of The Dynamic Three with DJ Rockmaster Scott makes his appearance and talks about his time in the hip hop culture. Classics such as "The Roof Is On Fire" among others plus some newer material are heard in this episode.

item.title: THE OLD SCHOOL RADIO HOUR:BORN IN THE BRONX
item.description: We go back into our archives for this one. This was originally broadcast live on November 2, 2007 on G-Town Radio. This is the review show on the groundbreaking book detailing hip hop's early days from the late 70s to the mid 80s in photos and that book was Born In The Bronx,which is still available in your local bookstore. This includes interviews with Joe Conzo,hip hop's first photographer and Johan Kugelberg,the editor of the book. Accompanying those interviews are some of the rare and classic cuts that are mentioned in the book and more joints.
item.dc:creator: THE OLD SCHOOL RADIO HOUR
item.itunes:summary: We go back into our archives for this one. This was originally broadcast live on November 2, 2007 on G-Town Radio. This is the review show on the groundbreaking book detailing hip hop's early days from the late 70s to the mid 80s in photos and that book was Born In The Bronx,which is still available in your local bookstore. This includes interviews with Joe Conzo,hip hop's first photographer and Johan Kugelberg,the editor of the book. Accompanying those interviews are some of the rare and classic cuts that are mentioned in the book and more joints.

item.title: THE OLD SCHOOL RADIO HOUR:DON'T YOU SIT BACK DOWN-THE CHERYL THE PEARL STORY
item.description: Long awaited and now here for your listening pleasure,we finally have Cheryl The Pearl of The Sequence,the first female group to record hip hop and known for cuts like "Funk You Up","Simon Says Dance" and more. You will hear her side of the story on her involvement in the hip hop culture from her time as a member of the roster of the groundbreaking hip hop label,Sugar Hill Records all the way to her new material. It's Women's History Month!!
item.dc:creator: THE OLD SCHOOL RADIO HOUR
item.itunes:summary: Long awaited and now here for your listening pleasure,we finally have Cheryl The Pearl of The Sequence,the first female group to record hip hop and known for cuts like "Funk You Up","Simon Says Dance" and more. It's Women's History Month!!

item.title: THE OLD SCHOOL RADIO HOUR:THE KOOL ROCK STORY
item.description: Another exclusive interview on OSRH and this features MC legend,Kool Rock b/k/a Kool Rock Ski of the legendary Fat Boys,one of hip hop's influential novelty groups from the 1980s. Hear his side of the story plus some of classic Fat Boys singles along with some new material from Kool Rock himself. Prepare to be schooled.
item.dc:creator: THE OLD SCHOOL RADIO HOUR
item.itunes:summary: Another exclusive interview on OSRH and this features MC legend,Kool Rock b/k/a Kool Rock Ski of the legendary Fat Boys,one of hip hop's influential novelty groups from the 1980s. Hear his side of the story plus some of classic Fat Boys singles along with some new material from Kool Rock himself. Prepare to be schooled.

item.title: THE OLD SCHOOL RADIO HOUR:LUMINARY ICON-THE SHA ROCK STORY
item.description: Another ultimate interview by TG-The Analog Master of Disaster with an individual that we have tried so hard for years to get at. Sha Rock,the first luminary female MC of the hip hop culture tells an abridged side of her story and her involvement in the culture as a member of The Funky Four Plus One More and later,Us Girls. Complimenting the interview are classic Funky Four tunes and rarities and recent cuts.
item.dc:creator: THE OLD SCHOOL RADIO HOUR
item.itunes:summary: Another ultimate interview by TG-The Analog Master of Disaster with an individual that we have tried so hard for years to get at. Complimenting the interview are classic Funky Four tunes and rarities and recent cuts.

item.title: THE OLD SCHOOL RADIO HOUR:THE STEVIE D STORY
item.description: Stevie D,singer,MC,one of the founding members of the legendary hip hop/r&b group,The Force MD's is the special guest via telephone on this episode. He tells his side of the story on his involvement in the early hip hop culture and stories with The Force MD's and his early crew,The Force MC's. You will hear not only some of the hottest cuts by the MD's plus some rare live material by The Force MC's. This was originally broadcasted live on Volta Radio on September 5, 2009.
item.dc:creator: THE OLD SCHOOL RADIO HOUR
item.itunes:summary: Stevie D,singer,MC,one of the founding members of the legendary hip hop/r&b group,The Force MD's is the special guest via telephone on this episode. He tells his side of the story on his involvement in the early hip hop culture and stories with The Force MD's and his early crew,The Force MC's. You will hear not only some of the hottest cuts by the MD's plus some rare live material by The Force MC's. This was originally broadcasted live on Volta Radio on September 5, 2009.

item.title: THE OLD SCHOOL RADIO HOUR:MASTERS OF THE SCRATCH IX-SCRATCHMASTA JAZZY G
item.description: The 9th edition of our Masters of The Scratch series with the legendary Scratchmasta Jazzy G(of The B-Boys with Chuck Chillout and Donald D). Jazzy G will rock you like a hurricane with his cuts an scratches and his mix of not only old school hip hop and breakbeats but with some classic club knockers as well. A real treat for your ears.
